      • addSound

        public void addSound​(java.lang.String id,
                     Sound snd)
        Add a sound to the id (multiple sounds can be applied to an id, and a random one would be played upon a call to get(java.lang.String) or play(java.lang.String, boolean, float)
        Parameters:
        id - Id
        snd - sound

      • addFile

        public void addFile​(java.io.File file,
